---
title: "🗓️ Week 03 - The Cloud: accessing and getting data in and out."
date: 16 September 2022
date-meta: 16 September 2022
---

You probably use iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive or OneDrive to store some of your files but what does it feel like to enter **the cloud**? We will learn how these systems are setup and in our labs, we will access and interact with a computer that lives in the Amazon WebService cloud (AWS).
